title: Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition, GPS Outdoor Watch, Solar Charging Capabilities, Surfing Features, Tracback Routing, Bells Beach 45 MM
descriptions:
### Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf Edition GPS Outdoor Watch - 45mm

**Harness the Power of the Sun and Ride the Waves Like Never Before**

Introducing the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf Edition – a rugged, reliable outdoor GPS watch designed for surfers, windsurfers, and kiteboarders who crave adventure and demand the most from their gear. With state-of-the-art solar charging capabilities, you'll have unlimited battery life in smartwatch mode with just 3 hours of sunlight per day (50,000 lux conditions), and up to an impressive 48 hours in GPS mode with continuous solar exposure.

**Surf-Specific Features:**
- Wave Counter: Never lose track of your action in the water.
- Max Speed Tracking: Push your limits and measure your top speeds.
- Distance Tracking: Monitor how far you've ridden the waves.
- Tide Data: Stay in sync with the sea for the best surfing experience.

**Windsurfing and Kiteboarding Essentials:**
- GPS Position: Navigate the waters with precision.
- Speed Measurement: Record your exhilaration as you glide over the surface.
- Distance Measurement: Gauge the expanses you conquer.
- Heart Rate Measurement: Keep an eye on your exertion levels.
- Elevation Data for Jumps: Analyze your aerial performance with detailed jump metrics.

**Compatibility and Smart Features:**
- Surfline Sessions™: Relive your best waves with seamless integration.
- Smart Notifications: Stay connected without taking your phone out on the water.
- Connect IQ™: Customize your watch with apps, widgets, and data fields.
- Garmin Pay: Simplify payments with contactless payment solution (noted limited availability or absence in some summaries).

**Stay Active and Informed:**
- Preloaded Activity Profiles: Tailored modes for running, biking, swimming, and strength training.
- Navigation Tools: 3-axis compass, barometric altimeter, and access to multiple satellite systems (GPS, GLONASS, Galileo) for accurate tracking.
- Health Monitoring: Keep tabs on your heart rate, sleep, Pulse Ox, and respiration, even when you're off the water.

**Built Tough for the Elements:**
- Water Rating: Dive in with confidence, water-rated to 100 meters.
- Thermal and Shock Resistance: Take on extreme conditions without hesitation.
- Case Material: Durable fiber-reinforced polymer to withstand your adventures.
- Glass Material: Scratch-resistant Corning Gorilla Glass for clear visibility in any situation.

The Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf Edition is the ultimate tool for outdoor enthusiasts who want to maximize their time on the water with the power of solar technology. Get ready to elevate your surfing, windsurfing, and kiteboarding experience with a watch that's as relentless as you are.

*Please note that features like Garmin Pay may have limited availability or may not be included, as indicated in the provided summaries. Always check the specific model capabilities when purchasing.*

**Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition GPS Outdoor Watch**

Harness the power of the sun and ride the waves with precision with the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition. Built for the outdoor enthusiast and water sports aficionado, this robust GPS-enabled smartwatch is your ultimate companion for surfing, windsurfing, kiteboarding, and a plethora of other activities.

**Key Features:**

- **Solar Charging Excellence:** With solar charging capabilities, enjoy unlimited battery life in smartwatch mode with just 3 hours of sunlight exposure per day (50,000 lux conditions) and extend your adventures with up to 48 hours in GPS mode under the same solar conditions.
  
- **Surfing Specialties:** Count your waves, track your max speed and distance, and stay ahead of the tides with built-in tide data. All this to ensure you make the most out of your time on the water.

- **Windsurfing and Kiteboarding Tools:** GPS tracking for precise positioning, speed measurement to gauge your performance, and elevation data for those high-flying jumps. Additionally, monitor your heart rate to keep your fitness levels in check.

- **Rugged Physical Specifications:** Ready to withstand the elements with a water rating of 100 meters, thermal and shock resistance. The fiber-reinforced polymer case and scratch-resistant Corning Gorilla Glass ensure durability in tough conditions.
  
- **Comprehensive Health Monitoring:** Keep tabs on your heart rate, sleep, respiration, and stress levels. The Pulse Ox feature (with limited availability) also helps you understand your body's oxygen absorption.

- **Navigation and Satellite Support:** Find your way with a 3-axis compass, barometric altimeter, and access to multiple satellite systems (GPS, GLONASS, Galileo).

- **Smart Connectivity and Compatibility:** Stay connected with smart notifications and customize your watch with apps from the Connect IQ Store. Compatible with Surfline Sessions for reviewing your wave conquests. Note that Garmin Pay is available with limited features.
  
- **Preloaded Activity Profiles:** Comes with a range of preloaded activity profiles including running, biking, swimming, and strength training, making it versatile for all your sports needs.

- **Size and Design:** A sleek 45 MM display size that fits comfortably on your wrist while maintaining a stylish and functional design.

Whether you're catching the next big wave, hitting the trails, or simply enjoying the great outdoors, the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition is the reliable watch that keeps up with your active lifestyle. Don't let charging hold you back – embrace the freedom of solar power and advanced technology at your fingertips.

**Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition GPS Outdoor Watch**

**Overview:**
Ride the waves or conquer the trails with the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition GPS Outdoor Watch. Designed for the outdoor enthusiast and water sports athlete, this rugged and reliable watch offers robust features tailored to your adventurous lifestyle. Its solar charging capabilities ensure that you stay powered up, while a suite of surfing, windsurfing, and kiteboarding features keep you informed and connected.

**Key Features:**

- **Solar Charging Technology:** Enjoy unlimited battery life in smartwatch mode with just 3 hours of sunlight per day (50,000 lux conditions). Extend your GPS mode usage up to 48 hours with continuous solar exposure.
- **Surfing Specialization:** Track your waves, maximum speed, distance, and access tide data to enhance your surfing sessions.
- **Windsurfing and Kiteboarding Tools:** Monitor your GPS position, speed, distance, heart rate, and even elevation data for jumps, all from your wrist.
- **Robust Compatibility:** Stay connected with smart notifications and Connect IQ, plus record your sessions with Surfline Sessions compatibility. (Note: Garmin Pay is not available on this model.)
- **Extensive Activity Profiles:** Preloaded with profiles for running, biking, swimming, and strength training, this watch is ready for any challenge.
- **Advanced Navigation:** Navigate confidently with a 3-axis compass, barometric altimeter, and access to multiple satellite systems (GPS, GLONASS, Galileo).
- **Health Monitoring:** Keep tabs on your well-being with heart rate, sleep tracking, Pulse Ox (limited availability), and respiration tracking.
- **Durable Design:** Built to endure with a water rating of 100 meters, thermal and shock resistance, a fiber-reinforced polymer case, and scratch-resistant Corning Gorilla glass.
- **Sleek Size:** The 45 MM size strikes the perfect balance between visibility and comfort.

Whether you're catching the perfect wave or embarking on a mountainous trek, the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition GPS Outdoor Watch is your ultimate companion for outdoor sports and adventures.

**Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition, GPS Outdoor Watch**

**Overview:**
Catch the perfect wave and track every thrilling ride with the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition. This robust GPS outdoor watch is designed for the serious surfer and outdoor enthusiast, offering an array of advanced features to enhance your water sports experience and keep you connected on the go.

**Solar Charging and Battery Life:**
- Solar Charging Capabilities: Enjoy unlimited battery life in smartwatch mode with just 3 hours of sunlight exposure per day (50,000 lux conditions).
- GPS Mode Duration: Extend your adventures with up to 48 hours of battery life in GPS mode, thanks to continuous solar charging.

**Surfing and Windsurfing/Kiteboarding Features:**
- Wave Counter: Never lose track of your total waves caught during your session.
- Maximum Speed and Distance Tracking: Measure the fastest speeds and distances you've conquered on the water.
- Tide Data: Stay informed with the latest tide information to pick the best times to surf.
- Heart Rate and Elevation Data for Jumps: Monitor your heart rate and track elevation data while you perform high-flying stunts.

**Compatibility and Connectivity:**
- Surfline Sessions: Connect and review your wave sessions with detailed reports.
- Smart Notifications: Stay connected with notifications for calls, texts, and alerts right on your wrist.
- Connect IQ: Personalize your watch with custom watch faces, data fields, and apps.

**Built for Durability:**
- Water Rating: Submersible up to 100 meters, this watch handles the depths of your aquatic adventures.
- Thermal and Shock Resistance: Built to withstand extreme elements and accidental impacts.
- Case Material: Crafted with fiber-reinforced polymer for durability and resilience.
- Glass Type: Scratch-resistant Corning Gorilla glass offers crystal-clear visibility and protection.

**Navigation and Health Monitoring:**
- GPS, GLONASS, and Galileo: Navigate the world with multiple satellite systems.
- 3-Axis Compass and Barometric Altimeter: Stay oriented and informed of elevation changes.
- Health Monitoring: Keep an eye on your heart rate, sleep quality, stress levels, and respiration with advanced tracking features.

**Additional Features:**
- Preloaded Activity Profiles: From running to strength training, track all your sports activities.
- Size: A comfortable 45 MM display size for easy viewing.
- Garmin Pay: Enjoy contactless payment convenience (note: availability varies).

Whether you're chasing the perfect wave or exploring the great outdoors, the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition GPS Outdoor Watch is your reliable partner for every adventure.

**Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition GPS Outdoor Watch**

Ride the waves and conquer the winds with the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition GPS Outdoor Watch – a timepiece designed to elevate the experience of surfers, windsurfers, and kiteboarders alike. Meticulously crafted to withstand the most challenging outdoor environments, this rugged and reliable watch combines Garmin's cutting-edge solar charging technology with a suite of specialized features tailored for aquatic sports enthusiasts.

**Key Features:**

- **Solar Charging Capabilities:** Harness the power of the sun with unlimited battery life in smartwatch mode with just 3 hours of sun exposure per day (50,000 lux) and up to 48 hours in GPS mode, ensuring you're always ready for the next adventure.
  
- **Surfing & Windsurfing Mastery:** Track every wave with the built-in wave counter, monitor your max speed, and measure the distance you've covered. Stay informed with tide data, and for windsurfers and kiteboarders, GPS position, speed, distance, heart rate, and elevation data for jumps are all at your wrist.
  
- **Robust Compatibility:** Sync with Surfline Sessions for video playback, receive smart notifications for a connected lifestyle, customize with Connect IQ, and note that Garmin Pay is included for contactless payments on the go.
  
- **Preloaded Activity Profiles:** Come prepared with profiles for running, biking, swimming, and strength training, allowing for seamless transitions between sports.
  
- **Advanced Navigation Tools:** Navigate confidently with a 3-axis compass, barometric altimeter, and access to multiple satellite systems (GPS, GLONASS, and Galileo).
  
- **Comprehensive Health Monitoring:** Keep an eye on your heart rate, sleep patterns, Pulse Ox (with limited availability), and respiration, as well as stress tracking to maintain a balanced lifestyle.
  
- **Durable Design for Extreme Conditions:** Rated waterproof to 100 meters and constructed with thermal and shock resistance, this watch is housed in a fiber-reinforced polymer case and protected by scratch-resistant Corning Gorilla glass, perfect for the harshest conditions.
  
- **Optimal Size & Visibility:** The 45 MM display ensures clear readability while being a comfortable fit for all your outdoor and water sport activities.

The Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition GPS Outdoor Watch is more than just a timekeeper; it's your companion in the quest for the perfect wave and the wildest winds. Whether you're counting swells or measuring jumps, this watch is designed to keep up with your passion. Take charge of your outdoor and athletic pursuits with this state-of-the-art, solar-powered ally on your wrist.

Preloaded activity profiles for running, biking, swimming, and strength training help you maintain a balanced fitness routine.

Whether you're catching the next big wave, gliding over the water with your kite, or exploring rugged trails, the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition GPS Outdoor Watch is the ultimate companion for your outdoor pursuits. Experience the ultimate in outdoor adventure with the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition GPS Outdoor Watch. Expertly designed for those who ride the waves or harness the wind, this rugged and versatile timepiece is an indispensable companion for your surfing, windsurfing, and kiteboarding pursuits.

**Product Features:**

- **Solar Charging Excellence:** With Garmin's advanced solar charging capabilities, enjoy unlimited battery life in smartwatch mode with just 3 hours of sunlight exposure per day (50,000 lux). In GPS mode, extend your activities up to 48 hours on a single solar charge.

### Product Listing: Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition, GPS Outdoor Watch

**Product Overview:**

Catch the wave of advanced technology with the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition, the ultimate GPS outdoor watch for surfers and water sports enthusiasts. Designed to withstand the toughest conditions, this rugged and reliable smartwatch is packed with features to enhance your surfing, windsurfing, and kiteboarding experiences.

**Key Features:**

- **Solar Charging Capabilities:** Embrace unlimited battery life in smartwatch mode with just 3 hours of sunlight per day (50,000 lux) and extend your adventures with up to 48 hours of GPS mode, all thanks to the watch's solar charging feature.
  
- **Surf & Tide Tracking:** Stay on top of your game with the built-in wave counter, max speed tracking, distance tracking, and crucial tide data that helps you pick the perfect time to hit the waves.

- **Windsurfing & Kiteboarding Dynamics:** GPS position, speed, distance, heart rate, and elevation data for jumps are all measured to give you comprehensive insights into your wind-powered sessions.

- **Health & Fitness Monitoring:** Keep tabs on your health with heart rate, sleep tracking, Pulse Ox (limited availability), and respiration tracking, ensuring you are in top form for every challenge.

- **Robust Navigation Tools:** Navigate confidently with a 3-axis compass, barometric altimeter, and access to multiple satellite systems (GPS, GLONASS, and Galileo).

- **Water-Resistant & Durable:** With a water rating of 100 meters, thermal resistance, and shock resistance, the Instinct 2 Solar is built to endure. The fiber-reinforced polymer case and scratch-resistant Corning Gorilla glass make it tough enough for any adventure.

- **Smart Connectivity:** Stay connected with smart notifications, compatibility with Surfline Sessions for viewing your wave videos, and Connect IQ for customizing your watch. Garmin Pay is featured as an additional convenience for contactless payments.

- **Preloaded Activity Profiles:** Comes with a variety of preloaded activity profiles, including running, biking, swimming, and strength training, making it a versatile companion for all your workouts.

- **Physical Specifications:** The watch has a display size of 45 MM, making it easy to read in any conditions.

**Product Specifications:**

- Product Name: Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition, GPS Outdoor Watch
- Charging: Solar (3 hours/day in 50,000 lux for unlimited smartwatch mode)
- Battery Life: Unlimited with solar (smartwatch mode), Up to 48 hours (GPS mode)
- Compatibility: Surfline Sessions, Smart Notifications, Connect IQ, Garmin Pay (in some models)
- Navigation: 3-axis compass, Barometric altimeter, GPS/GLONASS/Galileo
- Health Monitoring: Heart Rate, Sleep Tracking, Pulse Ox, Respiration Tracking
- Physical: Water Rating (100 meters), Thermal & Shock Resistance, Fiber-Reinforced Polymer Case, Corning Gorilla Glass
- Size: 45 MM

**Why Choose Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition?**

For the serious water sports enthusiast, the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar offers a suite of features that enhance performance and keep you connected, no matter where your adventures take you. The endless battery life with solar charging, robust tracking capabilities, and durable design make it the perfect companion for those who live their life in and around the water.

**Get ready to conquer the waves and beyond with the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition, GPS Outdoor Watch!**

**Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition, GPS Outdoor Watch**

Embark on your next wave-riding adventure with the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition GPS Outdoor Watch, the ultimate companion for surfers, windsurfers, and kiteboarders. Designed to withstand the toughest conditions and equipped with solar charging capabilities, this watch ensures you stay connected and informed without ever running out of power.

**Product Features:**

- **Surfing Mastery:** Track every wave with the built-in wave counter, monitor your maximum speed, and measure the distance you travel. Stay ahead of the tides with real-time tide data at your wrist.
  
- **Windsurfing and Kiteboarding Dynamics:** Navigate the winds with precision GPS positioning, speed, and distance tracking. Monitor your heart rate and capture elevation data for jumps to analyze your performance.
